mute them, then jail them, make sure the jail is far away from civilization. then they cant yell nor effect the other players.
if they get on anotehr acc then just ip mute them, or sadly bann, until you can get a antiflood folder, i actually have a flood command which will fuck the servers spammers lol, it will basicly dc and spammer most likely are afking.
